In a rush hour scenario choosing a route that aligns with altruistic principles involves evaluating which option will collectively reduce congestion and travel time for everyone involved. Even if this might result in a slightly longer trip for you the overall benefit in terms of time economy and decreased frustration for the majority could prevail as a better community-centric decision.
